channel.title: Teams on ii
channel.description: Recent content in Teams on ii

item.title: Abby Crimlis
item.description: Abby serves as a Cloud Native Technical Engineer and Educational Outreach Specialist at ii. She blends technical expertise with educational outreach. With a passion for fostering curiosity and self-confidence across diverse age groups, she designs and implements innovative programs, gets involved in engaging events, and collaborates with local organisations throughout the Bay of Plenty region

item.title: Berno Kleinhans
item.description: The first member of the ii groupies club. Striving for impactful change in the world through relationships and opensource collaboration.

item.title: Brenda Peel
item.description: If you'd like to get in touch with ii, Brenda is your first point of contact. At ii, Brenda Peel seamlessly manages and coordinates all things from start to finish. There is nothing too big for Brenda to conquer. And she does it all with a smile. Before moving to New Zealand with her husband and two dogs, Brenda worked as a Publisher Relationship Manager and Digital Project Coordinator in Cape Town, South Africa.

item.title: Caleb Woodbine
item.description: Caleb is a software engineer at ii. Driven by community, he loves the collaboration of individuals - especially through Open Source. Caleb contributes to the Kubernetes Infrastructure working group, sig-testing, and the conformance working group. Caleb also spends way too much time with container technologies and Golang.

item.title: Hippie Hacker
item.description: Chris McClimans is first and foremost a visionary. Chris envisions a world where everyone shares their knowledge base as well as their skills and resources. In our world of tech, this happens through open source.

item.title: Jay Tihema
item.description: Jay is awesome and a valued member of our team! Bio coming soon

item.title: Riaan Kleinhans
item.description: Riaan Kleinhans is the Project manager at ii. Helping a team of talented people to focus on what they do best. Keeping the team organized and on target.

item.title: Stephen Heywood
item.description: Stephen Heywood is a cloud-native advocate that brings together 20 years of exploring open source technologies with an extensive set of skills from various industries. From tertiary education (12 years); corporate IT (5 years) and the electricity sector (8 years), each has provided him with a wealth of information and a long history of industry certifications. To unwind, Stephen enjoys an eclectic range of hobbies, from architecture, podcasts, movies while learning about different programming languages.

item.title: Zach Mandeville
item.description: Zach is a software engineer at ii. He loves sharing the excitement and awesome potential of technology through his work, storytelling, and mad science projects.
